author: David Williams and Chloe Melas, CNN
title: Florida sheriff getting 6 tips a day in 1997 'Tiger King' disappearance
description: A Florida sheriff is using the hype surrounding the wildly popular Netflix series "Tiger King: Murder, Mayhem and Madness" to seek new leads in the case of Jack Donald "Don" Lewis, who's been missing since 1997.
content:
(CNN)A Florida sheriff is using the hype surrounding the wildly popular Netflix series "Tiger King: Murder, Mayhem and Madness" to seek new leads in the case of Jack Donald "Don" Lewis, who's been missing since 1997.
Lewis was married to Big Cat Rescue owner… [+1552 chars]
